ARABIC: فَٱسْتَمْسِكْ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So hold fast to what has been revealed to you. You are on a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So hold fast to what has been revealed to you. You are truly on the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So hold fast to what has been revealed to you. Surely you are on the Straight Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Follow devotedly that which is revealed to you. You are certainly on the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore hold fast to what We have divinely revealed to you; indeed you are upon the Straight Path. (The Holy Prophets can never go astray).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So hold you fast to that which is revealed to you. Verily, you are on the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore hold fast to that which has been revealed to you; surely you are on the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So hold thou fast unto that which has been revealed unto thee; surely thou art upon a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So hold thou fast to that which is inspired in thee. Lo! thou art on a right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So, hold fast to the Book that has been revealed to you, you are surely on the right path,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hold thou fast wherefore to that which is revealed Unto thee: verily thou art on the straight path. s
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So hold fast to what has been revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So hold thou fast to the Revelation sent down to thee; verily thou art on a Straight Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So hold you (O Muhammad SAW) fast to that which is inspired in you. Verily, you are on a Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, hold fast to that which is revealed to you, indeed, you are on the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So adhere to what is revealed to you. You are upon a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:43] So hold fast to that which has been revealed to you, namely, the Qur’ān; surely you are on a straight path, [a straight] way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So hold thou fast to) act upon (that which is inspired in you) i.e. the Qur'an. (Lo! thou) Muhammad (art on a right path) are on an established religion with which Allah is pleased.
